titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arthur Vogel Papers TAM.195
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff, 2010.

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-07-17T14:10-0400

change.item: Edited by Maggie Schreiner to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA. The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Arthur Vogel was a leftist playwright, and at one time probably a member of the Communist Party USA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection principally consists of typescripts of Vogel's unpublished plays. The collection also includes correspondence, other writings, and clippings.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Arthur Vogel Papers; TAM 195; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1997.066.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Arthur Vogel are held by Arthur Vogel. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Arthur Vogel.
